scripts.build: node scripts/generate-sitemaps.mjs && node scripts/generate-image-sitemap.mjs && node scripts/generate-feed.mjs && vite build && vite build --ssr entry-server.tsx --outDir dist/server && node scripts/prerender.mjs
scripts.generate-all-seo: node scripts/generate-sitemaps.mjs && node scripts/generate-image-sitemap.mjs && node scripts/generate-feed.mjs
